detailsOfAchievement: Major Achievements of activities could be as under: 1. SHGs promoted more than 1500, 25 federations, 2 Farmer Producer Organizations and several issue based groups 2. Agriculture development through context based package of practices and technologies and promotion of High Value crops, pulses and oilseeds with outreach of more than 11000 farmers. Community based Disaster Risk Reduction at 3 Flood Prone locations in East UP & Bihar more than 75 villages. Early Warning Systems also established & functional. 3. Women Literacy Programme with 50 centers & 1500 women for empowerment in eastern UP. 4. Basic support and linkage with various Govt benefits to migrant construction workers in Lucknow. Vocational training to youth. 5. Water Sanitation & Hygiene programme in more than 136 villages with SBM scheme of Govt with focus on CLTS approach & toilet uses. 6. Promotion of Goat rearing on scintific lines with more than 2000 families in Ajmer & Lalitpur with local Pasu Sakhis. Dairy activities with proper livestock raising is being promoted. 7. GDS also works as resource organization on community development themes and provide capacity building support to other stakeholders

detailsOfAchievement: We are creating opportunities for employment and entrepreneurship through a variety of programs such as building and running schools implementing vocational and skills training centres and the creation of an Industrial Training Institute. sourceOfFunds.purpose: Rahrai, is a remote rural area.To provide quality education to the children of this area GMVS is setting up a new school project. Community development and social and economic empowerment of women through Mahilamandals, vocational training, Micro credits programs etc are part of the project. While taking up this new project in Rahrai we continue the on going school and community development projects in Asmoli development block, Sambhal Dt .and educational sponsorship to children.

To support the on going school project in Rahrai by getting ready the ground floor of the school building to start the school in this academic year. To continue the on going community development programs in Asmoli and Rahrai regions and to continue the educational sponsorship to children from the Asmoli and Rahrai regions and from leprosy colonies.

To continue the support to the on going school project in Rahrai i.e. getting ready the school building for the coming academic year and preparing a residence for the teaching staff from outstation. To continue the on going community development programs in Asmoli and Rahrai regions.To continue the educational sponsorship to children from the Asmoli and Rahrai regions and from leprosy colonies.

For the completion of the first floor of Rahrai school building and for the continuation of the ongoing community development projects in Asmoli an Rarhrai. To continue the educational sponsorship to children from the Asmoli and Rahrai regions and from leprosy colonies.

For the completion of the second floor of Rahrai school building and for the continuation of the ongoing community development projects in Asmoli an Rarhrai. To continue the educational sponsorship to children from the Asmoli and Rahrai regions and from leprosy colonies.

For the completion of the second floor of Rahrai school building,new primary block in Asmoli campus and for the continuation of the ongoing community development projects in Asmoli and Rarhrai. To continue the educational sponsorship to children from the Asmoli and Rahrai regions and from leprosy colonies.

detailsOfAchievement: Gyan Bharti Samiti, established in the year 2000 under the societies act 1860, by a great visionary and educational activist Late Mr. Ajay Baranwal. Our aim is to draw out the best of the inborn potentials of a child providing him/her a favorable environment to make him/her to caster the fast growing needs of the nation. The main objective of the organization is to train its students for the world of challenging tomorrow. It helps to provide an education, designed to the proper mental, physical, spiritual, social and skill development of the pupils. It aims to inculcate in its students, strong attitudes of self reliance and confidence along with proper study habits and technical skills, so that they maybe able to make their contribution to society and strengthen themselves financially.
